biotools.summary: Analyse a pair of homologous mammalian DNA sequences (i.e. human and mouse/rat) for high probability binding sites of known transcription factors. A set of Position-Specific Scoring Matrices (PSSM) has been carefully constructed from mammalian transcription factor binding sites deposited in TRANSFAC database.

bioschemas.name: Footer
